alert.note: Alert for Ashley; Chicot (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 29 at 9:18PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Chicot and Ashley Counties, northwestern Morehouse Parish, Washington and southern Bolivar Counties through 1015 PM CST... At 917 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorm near Berlin, or 8 miles northwest of Wilmot, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Parkdale around 925 PM CST. Portland around 930 PM CST. Montrose around 935 PM CST. Chicot Junction around 945 PM CST. Lake Village and Mcmillan Corner around 950 PM CST. Greenville and Winterville around 1010 PM CST. Leland and Metcalfe around 1015 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this storm include Arcola. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CST for southeastern Arkansas...northeastern Louisiana...and northwestern Mississippi.
